flow.name: vm_insert_employee_flow
flow.doc:description: This flow contains the process of inserting employee details and contact information of the employee to 2 separate databases

message-properties-transformer.doc:name: Store Contact Info
message-properties-transformer.doc:description: Store contact information for insert contact input data after insert employee

db:insert.doc:name: Insert Employee
db:insert.doc:description: Insert employee details into employees database table employees with input data first name, last name, age, and gender. After insert the component will return the emp_id of the insert data

set-payload.doc:name: Get Return ID Payload
set-payload.doc:description: extract the return of the database component from payload[0]

json:object-to-json-transformer.doc:name: Object to JSON
json:object-to-json-transformer.doc:description: convert the mapped payload to json string for extraction

set-payload.doc:name: SET INSERT QUERY
set-payload.doc:description: Create insert statement for insert contact details, get data from current payload JSON string for the emp_id and get contact details from the previously stored data in the session for the contact data information

logger.doc:description: Check the current payload which contains the Query string to be used in inserting the contact details information

db:insert.doc:name: Insert Contact Details
db:insert.doc:description: Insert contact information in the employee_details database and into the contacts table, insert data are emp_id from previous insert, home address, email address, mobile phone number.
